titleStmt.title: The second apology for the Protestants of Ireland, by the author of the first shewing the necessity of their flight and desertion : and that the present destruction of Ireland hath conduced to the safety and preservation of England : in a letter to Sir. O. S.
titleStmt.author: Philips, George, 1599?-1696.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
